== Main Inclusion Report for sourcepackage ==

=== Requirements ===

 0. ''Availability:''
** http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/a/anthy, available for all supported architectures
 0. ''Rationale:''
** Japanese input method is required by Japanese people. It's a critical issue for them because they can't input their native language without it.
** See also MainInclusionReportscim
** See also MainInclusionReportScimAnthy. Anthy is required by scim-anthy.
 0. ''Security:''
** No security histroy.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Anthy is the best maintained Japanese conversion engine in Japan.
** There are a few candidates for japanese conversion engine such as Canna and FreeWnn, but they aren't maintained anymore.
** Fedora, Suse, Mandriva choose it as their default Japanese conversion engine.
** No critical bugs 
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets debian-policy and FHS.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
** scim MainInclusionReportscim
